events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on the highway. Immediate filing of claim requested.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident cluster due to keywords in the initial report referencing vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case, ensuring close follow-up and customer support through the process.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and the customer received confirmation along with information on next steps in processing.
Customer was requested to submit police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any medical reports to support the claim.
All required documentation including police report and vehicle damage photos were submitted by the customer ahead of timeline.
Investigation initiated by the claims team to verify accident details and damage extent based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the vehicle collision and establishing liability with supporting documentation.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and associated costs, pending customer's agreement.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed gratitude for the timely handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved based on investigation results and customer acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment covering the repair costs was issued to the customer promptly, ensuring minimal disruption in vehicle restoration.
The insurance claim was closed successfully after confirming that the vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim documents and correspondence archived for future reference and compliance with record-keeping policies.
